verses.verse: And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> for the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and for their heads <S%H7218><s%>, and for their judges <S%H8199><s%>, and for their officers <S%H7860><s%>; and they presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Your fathers <S%H1><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the flood <S%H5104><s%> in old time <S%H5769><s%>, even Terah <S%H8646><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, and the father <S%H1><s%> of Nachor <S%H5152><s%>: and they served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>.

And I took <S%H3947><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> from the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the flood <S%H5104><s%>, and led <S%H3212><s%> him throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> his seed <S%H2233><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> him Isaac <S%H3327><s%>.

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and Esau <S%H6215><s%>: and I gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Esau <S%H6215><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>, to possess <S%H3423><s%> it; but Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and his children <S%H1121><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

I sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> also and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and I plagued <S%H5062><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, according to that which <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them: and afterward <S%H310><s%> I brought you out <S%H3318><s%>.

And I brought <S%H3318><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and ye came <S%H935><s%> unto the sea <S%H3220><s%>; and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> with chariots <S%H7393><s%> and horsemen <S%H6571><s%> unto the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And when they cried <S%H6817><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, he put <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H3990><s%> between you and the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> upon them, and covered <S%H3680><s%> them; and your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> what I have done <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and ye dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> season <S%H3117><s%>.

And I brought <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; and they fought <S%H3898><s%> with you: and I gave <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand <S%H3027><s%>, that ye might possess <S%H3423><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>; and I destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> you.

Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, arose <S%H6965><s%> and warred <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> to curse <S%H7043><s%> you:

But I would <S%H14><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>; therefore he blessed <S%H1288><s%> you still <S%H1288><s%>: so I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And ye went over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> unto Jericho <S%H3405><s%>: and the men <S%H1167><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against you, the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%>, the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>; and I delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And I sent <S%H7971><s%> the hornet <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, which drave them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, even the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>; but not with thy sword <S%H2719><s%>, nor with thy bow <S%H7198><s%>.

And I have given <S%H5414><s%> you a land <S%H776><s%> for which ye did not labour <S%H3021><s%>, and cities <S%H5892><s%> which ye built <S%H1129><s%> not, and ye dwell <S%H3427><s%> in them; of the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> and oliveyards <S%H2132><s%> which ye planted <S%H5193><s%> not do ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

Now therefore fear <S%H3372><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> him in sincerity <S%H8549><s%> and in truth <S%H571><s%>: and put away <S%H5493><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the flood <S%H5104><s%>, and in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and serve <S%H5647><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And if it seem evil <S%H7489><s%> unto you <S%H4310><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, choose <S%H977><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> whom <S%H5869><s%> ye will serve <S%H5647><s%>; whether the gods <S%H430><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> that were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the flood <S%H5104><s%>, or the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, in whose land <S%H776><s%> ye dwell <S%H3427><s%>: but as for me and my house <S%H1004><s%>, we will serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, God forbid <S%H2486><s%> that we should forsake <S%H5800><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, to serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>;

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that brought us up <S%H5927><s%> and our fathers <S%H1><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>, and which did <S%H6213><s%> those great <S%H1419><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> in our sight <S%H5869><s%>, and preserved <S%H8104><s%> us in all the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein we went <S%H1980><s%>, and among all the people <S%H5971><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> whom we passed <S%H5674><s%>:

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> drave out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> us all the people <S%H5971><s%>, even the Amorites <S%H567><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>: therefore will we also serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; for he is our God <S%H430><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Ye cannot <S%H3201><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: for he is an holy <S%H6918><s%> God <S%H430><s%>; he is a jealous <S%H7072><s%> God <S%H410><s%>; he will not forgive <S%H5375><s%> your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> nor your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

If ye forsake <S%H5800><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, then he will turn <S%H7725><s%> and do you hurt <S%H7489><s%>, and consume <S%H3615><s%> you, after <S%H310><s%> that he hath done you good <S%H3190><s%>.
And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, Nay; but we will serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Ye are witnesses <S%H5707><s%> against yourselves that ye have chosen <S%H977><s%> you the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, to serve <S%H5647><s%> him. And they said <S%H559><s%>, We are witnesses <S%H5707><s%>.

Now therefore put away <S%H5493><s%>, said he, the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> which are among <S%H7130><s%> you, and incline <S%H5186><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> will we serve <S%H5647><s%>, and his voice <S%H6963><s%> will we obey <S%H8085><s%>.

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the people <S%H5971><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> them a statute <S%H2706><s%> and an ordinance <S%H4941><s%> in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, and set it up <S%H6965><s%> there under an oak <S%H427><s%>, that was by the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all the people <S%H5971><s%>, Behold, this stone <S%H68><s%> shall be a witness <S%H5713><s%> unto us; for it hath heard <S%H8085><s%> all the words <S%H561><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto us: it shall be therefore a witness <S%H5713><s%> unto you, lest ye deny <S%H3584><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> let the people <S%H5971><s%> depart <S%H7971><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> unto his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%>, being an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>.

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnathserah <S%H8556><s%>, which is in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> of Gaash <S%H1608><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> that overlived <S%H748><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and which had known <S%H3045><s%> all the works <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that he had done <S%H6213><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>. overlived: Heb. prolonged their days after Joshua

And the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, buried <S%H6912><s%> they in Shechem <S%H7927><s%>, in a parcel <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> which Jacob <S%H3290><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hamor <S%H2544><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Shechem <S%H7927><s%> for an hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of silver <S%H7192><s%>: and it became the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>. pieces: or, lambs

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>; and they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in a hill <S%H1389><s%> that pertained to Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, which was given <S%H5414><s%> him in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.
